if a
-----
DataListIf(
  Expr: ExpressionVariable(
    Identifier: string(a)
  )
  Iter: nil
)
=====
if a if b
-----
DataListIf(
  Expr: ExpressionVariable(
    Identifier: string(a)
  )
  Iter: DataListIter(
    For: nil
    If: DataListIf(
      Expr: ExpressionVariable(
        Identifier: string(b)
      )
      Iter: nil
    )
  )
)
=====
if a for b in c
-----
DataListIf(
  Expr: ExpressionVariable(
    Identifier: string(a)
  )
  Iter: DataListIter(
    For: DataListFor(
      Idents: [
        b
      ]
      Expr: ExpressionList(
        Expressions: [
          ExpressionVariable(
            Identifier: string(c)
          )
        ]
      )
      Iter: nil
    )
    If: nil
  )
)
=====
?
-----
expecting IF in parseListIf, found ERROR
=====
if ?
-----
expecting LAMBDA in parseTestNoCond, found ERROR
=====
if a for ?
-----
expecting ID, found ERROR
